radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver shows no evidence of focal lesions or textural abnormality. There is no evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary dilatation. There is sludge and multiple gallstones within the gallbladder. The gallbladder is not fully distended and the gallbladder wall is thin. The visualized portions of the pancreas are unremarkable. The spleen measures 8.4 cm and is normal. The right kidney measures 11.4 cm and left kidney measures 10.4 cm. The aorta is of normal caliber throughout. The visualized portions of the inferior vena cava appear normal. Doppler assessment of the main portal vein shows patency and normal hepatopetal flow. There is no ascites.
